attributes.action: Close all non essential  Click and collect shops.
attributes.additional_details: So staff be furloughed  in non essential
attributes.background: To protect  staff  by staying at home during  this  lockdown

rejection.details:
The national lockdown and requirements for certain retail businesses to close or operate as click and collect services end on 2 December, after which a new system of local restrictions will operate. Under this new system all essential and non-essential retail businesses will be able to open: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/local-restriction-tiers-what-you-need-to-know

We could accept a petition calling for non-essential retail businesses to be required to close in certain tiers, if that is what you want to happen.
